thread.title: Kajal Kumari, Riyaz Akbar emerge IFC carrom champs
thread.title_full: Kajal Kumari, Riyaz Akbar emerge IFC carrom champs - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: Kajal Kumari, Riyaz Akbar emerge IFC carrom champs
text:
World No 4 Riyaz Akbar Ali and second seed Kajal Kumari won the men's and women's titles respectively at the LIC Of India-sponsored 7th International Federation Cup carrom tournament organised by the All India Carrom Federation at the Tyagaraja Sports Complex in New Delhi recently.
Riyaz beat World Champion Nishant Fernando of Sri Lanka 25-22, 25-10 to annexe the men's crown, while Kajal beat compatriot Tuba Sehar 25-16, 8-25, 25-7 to emerge the women's champion.


Women's champ Kajal Kumari and men's winner Riyaz Akbar with their 7th International Federation Cup carrom trophies
